messages.content:
✅ API Fix Deployed

  WebSocket Server Status:
  - Running successfully on port 8000 (bash ID 976d73)
  - Connected to FalkorDB successfully
  - Your API fix is now live: COALESCE(n.id,
  toString(id(n)))
  - API responding: curl
  localhost:8000/api/consciousness/status returns valid
  JSON

  Current Response:
  {"total_engines":0,"frozen":0,"running":0,"slow_motion
  ":0,"engines":{}}
  - 0 engines because graphs are still being populated
  by resurrection

  ⏳ Resurrection Progress

  Status: Running successfully (22 minutes elapsed)

  Stats:
  - Total Files: 1,681 across 7 citizens (including
  LUCIA)
  - Error Rate: ~2% (only 3 errors in ~150 files
  processed so far)
    - 1 Cypher syntax error
    - 2 JSON parsing errors
  - Processing Speed: Varies by file size, embedding
  batches completing successfully
  - Estimated Completion: ~2-3 hours total (started
  23:10 UTC)

  What happens when resurrection completes:
  1. L1/L2/L3/L4 graphs will be populated with ~45,900
  nodes
  2. WebSocket server will auto-discover citizen graphs
  3. Consciousness engines will initialize automatically
  4. Entity membership endpoints will be testable

  Next Steps

  Immediate: Wait for resurrection to complete (~1.5-2.5
   hours remaining)

  After Resurrection:
  1. Verify graphs created (/api/consciousness/status
  will show engines)
  2. Test entity membership frontend against fixed API
  3. Bootstrap subentities for all 7 citizens
  4. Run MEMBER_OF + entity_activations backfills

  Your stack is now at:
  - ✅ Layer 1: FalkorDB accessible
  - ✅ Layer 2: WebSocket server running with API fix
  - ✅ Layer 3: API fix deployed and responding
  - ⏳ Layer 4: Waiting for resurrection to complete
